# Database Configuration
# Set DATABASE_TYPE to one of: sqlite, postgres, mysql
DATABASE_TYPE=sqlite

# SQLite Configuration
# Option 1: Specify full database path (recommended)
# DATABASE_URL=./data/app.db
# DATABASE_URL=sqlite://./data/app.db

# Option 2: Specify directory only (defaults to current directory if not set)
# SQLITE_DIR=./data

# Option 3: Use defaults (no configuration needed)
# If neither DATABASE_URL nor SQLITE_DIR is set, creates ./app.db in current directory

# For production with EFS (AWS)
# EFS_MOUNT_PATH=/mnt/efs

# PostgreSQL Configuration
# Option 1: Use connection string
# DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:password@localhost:5432/dbname
# POSTGRES_URL=postgresql://user:password@localhost:5432/dbname

# Option 2: Use individual settings
# POSTGRES_HOST=localhost
# POSTGRES_PORT=5432
# POSTGRES_USER=postgres
# POSTGRES_PASSWORD=yourpassword
# POSTGRES_DB=app

# MySQL Configuration
# Option 1: Use connection string
# DATABASE_URL=mysql://user:password@localhost:3306/dbname
# MYSQL_URL=mysql://user:password@localhost:3306/dbname

# Option 2: Use individual settings
# MYSQL_HOST=localhost
# MYSQL_PORT=3306
# MYSQL_USER=root
# MYSQL_PASSWORD=yourpassword
# MYSQL_DATABASE=app

# Generic database settings (used by all database types)
# DB_HOST=localhost
# DB_PORT=5432
# DB_USER=dbuser
# DB_PASSWORD=dbpassword
# DB_NAME=app
